Passive.Name: Speed V
Passive.Desc: Speed Dice Slot +2. Gain an additional Speed die at Emotion Level 3. (Cannot Overlap)

Passive.Name: Echo of Blue
Passive.Desc: Immune to Range Attacks. Draw 2 Cards at the start of the Act. Take 1-2 less damage and Stagger damage from attacks.

Passive.Name: Echo of Red
Passive.Desc: Choose the Speed dice with the lowest value; the Speed values of the dice change to the maximum possible value. When using a Melee Combat Page, all dice on the page gain Power against targets with slower Speed. (+1 Power per 2 points of difference, up to 3)

Passive.Name: Echo of Purple
Passive.Desc: Defensive Dice Power +2. When inflicted with a status ailment, reduce the amount by half. (Rounded down, does not go below 1)

Passive.Name: Echo of Black
Passive.Desc: At the start of the Scene, draw until 5 pages are in hand. All dice on every third Combat Page used gain +2 Power.

Passive.Name: Former Director of Her Role's Namesake
Passive.Desc: At the end of each scene, all allies gain 1 Negative Emotion Coin. Userâ€™s Pages cost 1 less Light to play.
